name: app-cloner-video-generator
description: AI-powered video generator for App Cloner promotional content with OAuth, progress tracking, and multi-user support

scripts.build: cd mcp-server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Starting Vercel build...' && cd mcp-server && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && echo 'Ensuring all HTML files are in root for Vercel...' && cp -f *.html . 2>/dev/null || true && cp -f public/*.html . 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'Build completed for Vercel'

author: mrmoe28
